|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C2600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/21/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_C2600_v1.x |wlclass = AC2600 |series = Archer C2600 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C2600 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8064; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL256SAIFR0; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amp;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4;,,, 5GHz Power Amp;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, LEDE Project, SuperWRT
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2017 |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B010UR8AM2 |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c2600_v1 ''TP-Link Archer C2600'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c2600 ''Techdata: TP-Link Archer C2600''] <!-- Machine: Qualcomm Atheros AP148 reference board bus=pci,vendor=168c,device=0040,subsystem-vendor=168c,subsystem-device=0002 from ath10k/QCA99X0/hw2.0/board-2.bin -->
===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2015/32593-tp-link-debuts-ac-router-duo On '''SmallNetBuilder''''] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/tp-link-wireless-router-mu-mimo-ac,28350.html On '''TomsHardWare'''] *[http://www.guru3d.com/news-story/tp-link-archer-c2600-and-c3200-wi-fi-routers.html On '''Guru3d''']
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32871-tp-link-archer-c2600-ac-2600-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Archer C2600 AC2600 Wireless Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor :RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 32 MB (SPI, SOIC 16-pin) :2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (4x GbE)
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=54973 ''Plans to support TP-Link Archer C2600?'' on '''OpenWrt''' forum] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1350-tp-link-archer-c2600/ ''Archer C2600 topic'' on '''Openitforum.pl'''] :[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/164-tp-link-archer-c2600/ ''Archer C2600 photo gallery'']
